game.vanishcapabilities

Interface VanishAbleActor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MamboMarie

    public interface VanishAbleActor
    An actor that is able to vanish from the game map.

    This interface is used to define an actor that is able to vanish and reappear on the game map. Use this interface if you want to mimic an actor that is able to vanish and reappear on the game map.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Actor getActor()
      A method used to get this actor with a Actor reference.
      VanishAbleActor getVanishAble()
      A method used to get this actor with a VanishAbleActor reference.
      boolean stillVanished()
      A method used to determine the chances of a VanishAbleActor reappearing on the game map.

    • Method Detail

      • stillVanished

        boolean stillVanished()
        A method used to determine the chances of a VanishAbleActor reappearing on the game map.

        Implement this method to determine each individual actors chances of reappearing.

        Returns:
        true if and only if actor reappears on game map, otherwise false.

      • getActor

        Actor getActor()
        A method used to get this actor with a Actor reference.

        Implement this method to get a Actor reference.

        Returns:
        an actor.

      • getVanishAble

        VanishAbleActor getVanishAble()
        A method used to get this actor with a VanishAbleActor reference.

        Implement this method to get a VanishAbleActor reference.

        Returns:
        a VanishAbleActor.
